Interface StoringManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChapterManager, ChoiceManager, MediaManager, ServerManager, StoryManager

    public interface StoringManager
    Interface for storing objects locally (to the database).
    Author:
    Stephanie Gil, Ashley Brown
    See Also:
    StoryManager, ChapterManager, ChoiceManager, MediaManager, ServerManager
